pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, May 31, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

7:35 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Prayer Breakfast of Canada and deliver remarks.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 7:00 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
